attributes.action: introduce performace related pay for MPs independently adjudicated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs talk about an apathetic electorate who are 'turned off by politics.'  A major reason for this is both the expenses claimed by MPs, and the size of salary increases afforded to themselves by themselves regardless of their performance.  This petition requests MPs should receive a flat salary that is boosted by an independent performace review on an individual basis for each MP.
